GMI.SW.summary: Groupe Minoteries SA processes, refines, and markets grain and food raw materials in Switzerland. The company offers flour and grain products; organic flours and ready-to-use products, such as muesli, flakes, etc.; and breadcrumbs. It also offers various services for industry, commerce, and craft customers. The company was founded in 1885 and is headquartered in Granges-prÃ¨s-Marnand, Switzerland.
